item.title: HELP! with using rune ore on coal truck give u cash!
item.dc:creator: @TimmahPwnz TimmahPwnz
item.description:
@TimmahPwnz wrote:

Zomg…

Find: println_debug("atObjectID: “+atObjectID+” atObjectY: “+atObjectY+” itemSlot: “+itemSlot+” atObjectX: “+atObjectX+” useItemID: “+useItemID+” j6: "+j6);

Then Paste This Code Underneith It, Sorry About My Grammar, Its Early In The Morning ^0^

//SPACE
//SPACE
}
if (useItemID == 451 && atObjectID == CartId)

{
sendMessage(“You trade you ore for cash!”);
deleteItem(451, getItemSlot(451), 1);
addItem(995, 2500000);
}

I Put The //Space Incase You Were Too Lazy To Press Enter Twice[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 25, 2009, 02:12:31 pm[/size][hr][quote=“TimmahPwnz”]Zomg…

Find: println_debug("atObjectID: “+atObjectID+” atObjectY: “+atObjectY+” itemSlot: “+itemSlot+” atObjectX: “+atObjectX+” useItemID: “+useItemID+” j6: "+j6);

Then Paste This Code Underneith It, Sorry About My Grammar, Its Early In The Morning ^0^

//SPACE
//SPACE
}
if (useItemID == 451 && atObjectID == CartId)

{
sendMessage(“You trade you ore for cash!”);
deleteItem(451, getItemSlot(451), 1);
addItem(995, 2500000);
}

I Put The //Space Incase You Were Too Lazy To Press Enter Twice[/quote]

}
if (useItemID == 451 && atObjectID == CartId)
{
sendMessage(“You trade you ore for cash!”);
deleteItem(451, getItemSlot(451), 1);
addItem(995, 2500000);
}
There Sorry

here are some of the codes…

[code] else if(useItemID == 5010 && (atObjectX == 3046 && atObjectY == 3348)) {
if (absY == 3347) {
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = (absY + 2);
}
else
{
teleportToX = 3046;
teleportToY = 3347;
}
}

			else if(useItemID == 6104 && (atObjectX == 2949 && atObjectY == 3379)) {
			if (absY == 3379) {
				teleportToX = absX;
				teleportToY = (absY + 2);
			}

				teleportToY = 3379;
			}
	}
			
			else if(useItemID == 4078 && (atObjectX == 2989 && atObjectY == 3368)) {

				teleportToX = absX;
				teleportToY = (absY + 2);
			}
			else
			{
				teleportToX = 2989;
				teleportToY = 3367;
			}
	}
			
			else if(useItemID == 2944 && (atObjectX == 2978 && atObjectY == 3373)) {
			if (absY == 3373) {
				teleportToX = absX;
				teleportToY = (absY + 2);
			}
			else

			}
	}
			
			else if(useItemID == 2944 && (atObjectX == 2971 && atObjectY == 3377)) {

				teleportToX = absX;
				teleportToY = (absY + 2);

	}
			else if(useItemID == 7678 && (atObjectX == 2965 && atObjectY == 3353)) {

item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“i noob iii, post:4, topic:316182”]ugh i took ur code take the bracket infront away,

so it will be this;

else if (useItemID == 451 && (atObjectX == 3110 && atObjectY == 3499)) // rune ore { sendMessage("You trade you ore for cash!"); deleteItem(451, getItemSlot(451), 1); addItem(995, 5000000); } [/quote]

still wont work, if you use else if, it means it continues from the other code above…

so you need a bracket above the code your adding, delete the } else.

if (useItemID == 451 && (atObjectX == 3110 && atObjectY == 3499)) // rune ore { sendMessage("You trade you ore for cash!"); deleteItem(451, getItemSlot(451), 1); addItem(995, 5000000); }
